doc:
Ben Shenkman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ben_Shenkman 0 Benjamin "Ben" Shenkman (born September 26, 1968) is an American actor. He is known for his roles in the USA Network drama series Royal Pains and the HBO miniseries Angels in America, which earned him Primetime Emmy Award and Golden Globe Award nominations. Benjamin_"_Ben_"_Shenkman ( born September_26_,_1968 ) is an_American_actor . He is_known for his_roles in the_USA_Network_drama_series_Royal_Pains and the_HBO_miniseries_Angels in America , which earned him Primetime_Emmy_Award and Golden_Globe_Award_nominations .
